mounting instructions there are many methods of mounting a mandala onto a hoop but my preferred method is to cut a section of yarn about 15cm from the same yarn used on the last round and tie each point onto the hoop using a regular double knot make it as tight as possible slip the knot into the crochet piece at the back and sew the ends in if you are having an issues research on youtube
